Stock nanoplatelets have dimensions 26.577 nm by 5.418 nm and the optical density of 100x hexanes dilution of stock is 0.150% recorded at 512 nm. 0.250 mL nanoplatelets stock is diluted 7x by hexanes using 1.750 mL for each trial of doping. Silver acetate solution of 0.00070 M is made with 7.800 mg of silver acetate in 47.685 mL of MeOH and 19.074 mL of water. 10.000 % Ag doping requires 53.209 uL of silver doping solution, respectively. The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 10.0 minutes at 0.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.0109;0.0028

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 10.0 minutes at 0.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.04;0.02

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 10.0 minutes at 50.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.044000000000000004;0.019595917942265426

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 10.0 minutes at 0.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.056;0.038781438859330636

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 25.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.07800000000000001;0.03249615361854384

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 60.0 minutes at 50.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.10819999999999999;0.022112439937736414

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 0.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.15400000000000003;0.05851495535331118

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 60.0 minutes at 25.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.24000000000000002;0.12214745187681976

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 25.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.2712;0.17444127951835253

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 0.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.4660000000000001;0.7589624496640134

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 60.0 minutes at 50.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.526;0.274342851191716

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 10.0 minutes at 25.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.6020000000000001;0.6181067868904208

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 60.0 minutes at 25.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;1.494;2.152613295508508

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 10.0 minutes at 25.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;1.496;0.3116793223811936

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 10.0 minutes at 50.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;130.41000000000003;259.7951815565485

Silver acetate solution of 0.00070 M is made with 14.000 mg of silver acetate in 85.589 mL of MeOH and 34.236 mL of water. 5.000 % Ag doping requires 40.496 uL of silver doping solution, respectively. The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 60.0 minutes at 0.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;130.418;259.7913019637109
